Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/69th
ShortDescription: Southbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 67th, Dorchester, 70th & Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 67th, Dorchester, 70th and Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/69th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between O'Hare and  Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to a sick customer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to a sick customer.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Jefferson Park, and,
  • between Forest Park and Irving Park, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Jefferson Park and Irving Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Ashland. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
